body:
Do you have any runtime.GC() calls in your code? The comment in the trace
log that says GC Forced indicates that you do. If so try removing them,
they do a stop the world GC which can easily take many seconds.


On Thu, Sep 3, 2015 at 4:23 PM, Evgeny <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> After 40 minutes work on my laptop http://joxi.ru/bmoooLxfzRzRmy
> logs here https://yadi.sk/i/_1efKAP2irdJg
> app use GC at start 30-40 sec, and then it rests after line
> "2015/09/03 21:29:21 READY TO WORK :)"
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/12478#issuecomment-137563568>.
>
